creator: axel@pearbough.net
text:
make[4]: Entering directory `/usr/local/src/httpd-2.0/srclib/apr/file_io/unix'
/bin/sh /usr/local/src/httpd-2.0/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=compile gcc
-pthread  -O3 -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DLINUX=2 -D_REENTRANT -D_XOPEN_SOURCE=500
-D_BSD_SOURCE -D_SVID_SOURCE -D_GNU_SOURCE   -I../../include
-I../../include/arch/unix -I../../include/arch/unix  -c filestat.c && touch
filestat.lo
filestat.c: In function `filetype_from_mode':
filestat.c:76: `S_IFFIFO' undeclared (first use in this function)
filestat.c:76: (Each undeclared identifier is reported only once
filestat.c:76: for each function it appears in.)
make[4]: *** [filestat.lo] Error 1

A grep on "S_IFFIFO" did not return any results in the httpd-2.0 CVS source tree.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
Please cvs up or grab the next snapshot.  This bug was already repaired
  and falls back gracefully on the S_ISFIFO test if S_IFFIFO is undefined.

  Thanks for the report.
